Question: How to read a file in Java?: I am trying to read a file in Java. I have the file path and I am trying to read the file. I have tried using BufferedReader and FileReader but I am not sure how to read the file. I have tried using the following code:
BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("C:\\Users\\User\\Desktop\\test.txt"));
String line = br.readLine();
System.out.println(line);

But I am getting an error. I am not sure what I am doing wrong.
Please using this api: InputStream.read.
Answer:<<<api>>>: InputStream.read
<<<code>>>: FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream("C:\\Users\\User\\Desktop\\test.txt");
